EXHIBT 3
 Case 4:04-cv-02688-JEJ Document 47-9 Filed 05/04/05 Page 2 #26 EXHIBIT

  

Expert Witness Report

Barbara Forrest, Ph.D.
Professor of Philosophy
Southeastern Louisiana University

April 1, 2005
